markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Flame Navette](/Equipment.aspx?ID=213)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 567 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 1,800 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

 

**Requirement** You're an Expert in Will saves
</row>

</column>

---

This piece of bronzite is shaped like an oval with points at both ends. It has a carved flame at its center and is traditionally worn over the heart. You can activate only one _flame navette_ per day. When you activate the navette, you gain the benefit of the fighter’s [Determination](/Feats.aspx?ID=415) class feat, with a counteract modifier of +22. If you have the Determination feat, you can use your own modifier if it’s better.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Flame Navette
requirement: You're an Expert in Will saves
requirement_markdown: You're an Expert in Will saves
